## Bandname

> There are only two hard problems in computer science. Cache invalidation and naming things.

#### This library completely solves one of those problems!

# AMAZING

`npm install bandname`

```javascript
var bandname = require('bandname');
console.log(bandname());
```

### Sample output

```
Splendid Falcon
Spectacular Quetzal
Succinct Spoonbill
Tawdry Cattle
Spiteful Swan
Teeny-tiny Toad
Victorious Mandrill
Scientific Gaur
Upset Guanaco
Seemly Turkey
Slim Coyote
Sturdy Otter
Unaccountable Squirrel
Thoughtless Mandrill
Wrathful Meerkat
Sulky Jellyfish
Sleepy Ibis
Silky Falcon
Stupendous Bison
Uneven Caterpillar
```
